abstract: Manchester United reaches agreement with Bayern Munich to sign midfielder Bastian Schweinsteiger; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United announced that it had reached an agreement with Bayern Munich to sign Schweinsteiger, a 30-year-old midfielder and the captain of Germany’s national team.
snippet: Manchester United announced that it had reached an agreement with Bayern Munich to sign Schweinsteiger, a 30-year-old midfielder and the captain of Germany’s national team.
